title: Mohsin Naqvi grieved over death of IG Nasir Rizvi’s mother
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 2 (APP): Federal Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi expressed grief and sorrow over the death of IG Islamabad Police Ali Nasir Rizvi’s mother on Friday.
The Interior Minister expressed heartfelt sympathy and condolences to Ali Nasir Rizvi and the bereaved family
Mohsin Naqvi prayed for the rest of the soul of the deceased in peace and grant of patience to the bereaved family members.
The grief of separation from a person like mother cannot be expressed in words, he said.
